description: Savory tofu is braised with a mixture of soy sauce, ginger and black pepper and served atop a bed of soba noodles with tahini sauce and tender broccoli rabe in this hearty Asian inspired meal.
name: Soba Noodles with Tahini Sauce, Broccoli Rabe and Ginger Black Pepper Braised Tofu
recipeIngredient: 1 medium bunch broccoli rabe (about 1 1/2 lbs. stems removes and coarsely chopped)
1 lb. extra firm tofu (drained, pressed at least 15 minutes and cut into 1 inch cubes)

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of water to a boil and cook soba noodles according to package directions. 1 minute before cook time is up, add broccoli rabe to pot and stir well. Finish cooking and remove from heat. Drain in a large colander.
